job.name: MongoDB

variable.name: MONGODB_HOST
variable.description: Hostname or IP address of the MongoDB Database. Default value is localhost

variable.name: MONGODB_PORT
variable.description: The listening port of the MongoDB Database. Default value is 27018

job.description: Workflow template composed of two tasks import or export data from/to MongoDB.

task.name: Export_to_MongoDB
task.description: This task allows exporting data to MongoDB. The task requires the following third-party credentials: {key: mongodb://<username>@<hostname>:<port>, value: MONGODB_PASSWORD}. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: DOCKER_ENABLED
variable.description: If true, the workflow tasks will be executed inside a docker container

variable.name: DOCKER_IMAGE
variable.description: Name of the docker image used to execute the task

variable.name: MONGODB_COLLECTION
variable.description: The collection to use. It is created if it does not exist

variable.name: MONGODB_INPUT
variable.description: The JSON Object/Array to be inserted in MongoDB. It can be either a String describing the JSON Object/Array or a relative path of a JSON file in the Global Data Space

variable.name: MONGODB_DATABASE
variable.description: The database to use. It is created if it does not exist

task.name: Import_from_MongoDB
task.description: This task allows importing data from MongoDB. The task requires the following third-party credentials: MONGODB_USERNAME and MONGODB_PASSWORD. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: DOCKER_ENABLED
variable.description: If true, the workflow tasks will be executed inside a docker container

variable.name: DOCKER_IMAGE
variable.description: Name of the docker image used to execute the task

variable.name: MONGODB_QUERY
variable.description: A query used to find documents in the given collection. If empty, it will fetch the whole collection

variable.name: MONGODB_OUTPUT
variable.description: The relative path in the data space used to save the results in a CSV file

variable.name: MONGODB_DATABASE
variable.description: The database to use. It is created if it does not exist
